abstract: Zentiva rejected Sanofi-Aventis‘s $2.02 billion-offer for the shares of the Czech generic-drug maker that it doesn’t already own. Zentiva said the bid, made last week, was too low.
lead_paragraph: Zentiva rejected Sanofi-Aventis‘s $2.02 billion-offer for the shares of the Czech generic-drug maker that it doesn’t already own. Zentiva said the bid, made last week, was too low.
